name: Covid19: Facts & Fake News
description:
Covid19: Facts & Fake News was originally supposed to be a mobile Quizlet-like app launched on Google Play and App Store to present informations about the virus ravaging the world in a gamifyable way.

Although the information was taken from public sources of governmental health authorities and WHO, Google Play refused to publish it, so I want to at least share it with you guys here. Let me know what you think about the app.

Source document here.

Goal:

Answer correctly whether the statement is fact or fake news. Prove you didn't just guess the answer by answering the statement twice. Can answer all statement correctly to get 100% ? 

Controls (left and right arrows):

1. Push left or right arrow to view possible answer

2. If you believe the answer is correct press arrow again

3. If you picked wrong answer, you'll get to see the correct answer and explanation

4. Once you've read the explanation, press any key to move to the next card.
